channel.title: Moparscape 3.2 help
channel.description:
hey i got a few questions for moparscape 3.2 /w aryan,
how do i change my appearance?
when i like equip an item i lose connection, and i have to make a new char, and i cant get into members place, coz i cant open the gates from fally to (forgot its name) and well i cant do anything like use a good item :( and when i use a members item i dont get a special bar or attack like im supposed to with that item
can someone please help me be able to use them the way ur supposed too and all that, plus i cant open doors. i cant use bows, or any thing else :( not even magic[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 09:17:10 PM[/size][hr]well i dunno if i can double post but im sry if i cant, i really need help :([br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 02:25:10 AM[/size][hr]i REALLY need help :(

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 help
item.dc:creator: @AdrianTepes AdrianTepes
item.description:
@AdrianTepes wrote:

okey xD, thx ^-^ but y cant i use the items like how im supposed too?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 help
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

if u want to go through that gate, use ::noclip and just walk through it, now if u get a certain item above like 7000 it crashes, this is due to the fact that moparscape is a “copy client” and every time runescape adds a new item, they update the entire client. so what u need to do is get an off client other than moparscape, most of these are derived directly from runescape, so they can handle the items. and the speacial bar is NOT client side, so to get that, you have to go on someone else’s server who has specially designed their server to support special bars.

Read full topic
